Shareholder Name: Fawaz Abdul Sattar Al Alamy Al Hosny

Description: Batic Investments and Logistics Co (known as: Batic) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Batic operates within the Transportation sector focusing on Trucking. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia, working on Packaged Foods and Meats and Security and Alarm Services. Batic is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in January 1984.
